name: acornless
description:
⚠️ Warning: Volume may be loud.

Note: You cannot quit from the title/end screens on the web build.

Collect ichor by defeating enemies. Defeat all enemies to retrieve the golden acorn.

Controls (keyboard+mouse):

  • WASD to move
  • Left-click to attack
  • E to interact (pick up ichor)
  • Q to dash

Controls (XBox Controller):

  • Left joystick to move
  • X to attack
  • Y to interact (pick up ichor)
  • A to dash
  • Start button to begin the game from title/end screens

(other controllers should work too)

Assets Used:
